name: Buck

text: wa<in yamosasoka {ll~ahu biDur~K falaA kaA$ifa lahu,^ <il~aA huwa wa<in yuridoka bixayorK falaA raA^d~a lifaDolihi. yuSiybu bihi. man ya$aA^'u mino EibaAdihi. wahuwa {logafuwru {lr~aHiymu
